name: say the right thing (alekai)
description:
thoughts come to your head - you choose which ones to say and which to let pass. what you say affects what you’ll able to say in the future. will you say the right thing 2 get the girl ?

designed to be a little chaotic because brains are a little chaotic. this prototype was made in under a week for major studio

—————

CREDIT

i made everything but the sounds, which are mostly in the public domain
